entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this morning. High minus 18. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 18.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning after midnight. Blowing snow overnight. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 18. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
